long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,e:
Super Follow helps you super easy to Follow, Unfollow.

# Features
üéâSupports background processing
‚úÖ Supports multiple filtering conditions
‚úÖ Supports multiple target types - Follower,Following,Liker,Commenter,Hashtag,Location
‚úÖ Automatically save results to history.
‚úÖ Supports to export follow/unfollow history.
‚úÖ Intelligent error handling.

#ADVANCED FILTERING OPTIONS:
‚úì Min/Max Followers
‚úì Min/Max Following
‚úì Min/Max Posts
‚úì Private Accounts
‚úì Public Accounts
‚úì Verified Accounts
‚úì Non-Verified Accounts
‚úì Business Accounts
‚úì Recently Joined Accounts

# How to get started?
1. Select task type
2. Enter relevant content and select filtering options.
3. Click the task execution button.

# FAQ
https://pingapps.top/product-detail?app=IGAutoFollow#faq
If you have any problems, don't hesitate to contact us at pingappsteam@tailang.top

# Data Privacy
All the data you process is on your local computer and never passes through our servers.

# Statement
The extension is designed to reduce repetitive work, you shouldn't and can't send a lot of spam, in which case Instagram will ban your account soon.
